title: Hell Yeah Wrath of the Dead Rabbit-RELOADED
description:
nERv

Hell Yeah! Wrath of the Dead Rabbit (c) SEGA

10/2012: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Action, Platformer

Hell Yeah! is a crazy action-adventure platformer... In Hell

You are Ash, a devil rabbit and the prince of Hell. When some jerk finds it
funny to post your secret intimate photos all over the Hell-ternet, you get
VERY angry

Time to seek out the bastard and destroy him once and for all. While you're
at it, why not use this incredible journey to kill everybody else?

It's you against all Hell. It's Hell Yeah!

Features
* Tension-relieving faux-gore action Hell Yeah! helps you clear your mind
after a bad/frustrating/boring day at work. Achieve this by exploring the
four corners of Hell and exterminating monsters in a cheerful yet
challenging atmosphere
* This game is too BIG for you 10 huge game worlds with secret areas and
side quests, hundreds of objects, weapons and monsters to collect. If
you're a completionist, you're screwed man
* 'Finish him' moves that will make your mama cry inflict ultimate
humiliation on the monsters of Hell using over 30 deadly Finish
him! mini-games

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy over the cracked content
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

Note: This game requires XNA to be installed. If you havn't already, install
it from the redist subdir of where you installed the game
